Maritime Bulletin Daily Nov 02 – 03
03 Nov 2019, 06:21 by Mikhail Voytenko
Accidents• Freighter attacked in Gulf of Guinea, 9 crew kidnapped• Italian Aframax tanker Master medevac, France• Aground and Not Under Command vessels Worldwide Alerts (2 ships)
